title: Agent Trust Score Schema
description: Schema for storing trust scores and related metadata for agents.

score.description: The calculated trust score for the agent (typically between 0 and 1).

last_updated.description: Timestamp of the last trust score calculation for this agent.

data_points_used.description: Number of data points (e.g., justifications, loop outcomes) used in the last calculation.

contributing_factors_summary.description: A human-readable summary of the factors contributing to the current score.
